company.name: IronRide
company.location: New York and Jersey City area

services.name: Standard Ride
services.description: Quick and efficient rides for your everyday travel needs, with an emphasis on safety and professionalism.

services.name: Secure VIP Ride
services.description: Premium service with enhanced security for high-profile individuals, ensuring utmost discretion and safety.

services.name: Airport Transfer
services.description: Reliable and punctual transfers to and from the airport. We track your flight to ensure timely service.

services.name: Women & Family Safe Ride
services.description: Safe and comfortable rides with trained female drivers available for women and families upon request.

team.name: Captain Alex
team.title: Retired Army Officer
team.bio: Former Army Captain with extensive experience in logistics and security operations.

team.name: Sergeant Ben
team.title: Defense-Trained Professional
team.bio: Expert in tactical driving and passenger protection with military police background.

team.name: Lieutenant Chris
team.title: Former Military Police
team.bio: Specialized in threat assessment and secure transportation of VIP personnel.

values.title: Safety First
values.description: Your safety is our top priority. We employ rigorous background checks and continuous training to ensure a secure environment.

values.title: Professionalism
values.description: Our drivers are not just skilled; they are courteous professionals with a disciplined background, ensuring a polite and disciplined service.

values.title: Reliability
values.description: Count on us for timely and dependable service. We understand the importance of punctuality and strive to exceed expectations.

testimonials.name: Mark Thompson
testimonials.comment: The service was impeccable. The driver was so professional and the ride smooth. I felt completely safe.

testimonials.name: Sarah Miller
testimonials.comment: I felt safe and comfortable throughout my journey. The best cab service I've ever used.

testimonials.name: David Clark
testimonials.comment: Reliable and efficient service. I'll definitely be using IronRide for my business travels.

jobCategories.name: Driving
jobCategories.description: Professional drivers with defense training background
